body: We cover the core principles of aftercare: wash routines, conditioning strategy, and client education to protect results.
Bring your typical service cases and we will recommend a structured approach.
excerpt: Technical tips to maintain results, reduce damage, and improve client satisfaction post-service.
title: Color Care & Aftercare Essentials

body: This session is designed for working professionals. We focus on decision support: consultation flow, diagnosing needs, and selecting the right professional products.
No ticketing system is provided in Paket A. To register, contact our team via WhatsApp and mention the event name and your city.
excerpt: A practical session on consultation, product selection, and service quality for salon & barber.
title: Fundamentals of Professional Haircare
